member.name: T:RB.DocumentTypePicker.Controllers.Api.DocumentTypePickerApiController
member.summary: Umbraco API Controller for the Document Type Picker data type.

member.name: M:RB.DocumentTypePicker.Controllers.Api.DocumentTypePickerApiController.GetAllDocumentTypes
member.summary: Get method to retrieve a list of all document types.
member.returns: A sorted list of all document types.

member.name: T:RB.DocumentTypePicker.Converters.DocumentTypePickerValueConverter
member.summary: Value converter class to convert a json document type picker value object to a list of document type aliases.

member.name: M:RB.DocumentTypePicker.Converters.DocumentTypePickerValueConverter.ConvertDataToSource(Umbraco.Core.Models.PublishedContent.PublishedPropertyType,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method to convert a property value to alist of document type aliases
member.param: The current published property type to convert.
member.returns: A list of document type aliases.

member.name: M:RB.DocumentTypePicker.Converters.DocumentTypePickerValueConverter.IsConverter(Umbraco.Core.Models.PublishedContent.PublishedPropertyType)
member.summary: Method to see if the current property type is of type document type picker.
member.returns: True if the current property type of of type document type picker.
